name: Japan Automobile Standards Internationalization Center
headAddress: 7F, Zennihon Truck Sogo Kaikan., 3-2-5 Yotsuya, Shinjuku-ku
goal: We, JASIC intend to spread the Global Harmonization of car Regulations.
euInitiatives: We, JSAIC, participate to WP29 and GRs meeting in UNECE and Informal meeting for Global Harmonization of car Regulations. And we attend to the expert group meeting on laboratory alignment for the measurement of tyres rolling resistance under Regulation 1222/2009/EC.
